channel.title: Developer Blog
channel.description: Keep down in writing developer problems and solutions

item.title: How to create a HubPress post
item.description:
This article is about the syntax which is used to write posts via HubPress. HubPress’s syntax is based on AsciiDoc "a plain text documentation syntax and processor". Additionaly HubPress has extended this syntax: Hubpress Additional Syntax

Also HubPress has an recommanded writing guide here: Recommended-Practices
item.dc:creator: Andreas Gehle
